titleStmt.title: Angels rejoicing for sinners repenting. / Delivered in a sermon by the Right Reverend Father in God, Brian Duppa, now Bishop of Salisbury.
titleStmt.author: Duppa, Brian, 1588-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Rich: Royston at the Angel in Ivy-lane,
